exchange.question: Are you one of the Mega Fighting Bots?
exchange.answer: Mega? Me? Ha! I'm Bucket Bot -- the scrap pile they send out every time a new player registers.

exchange.question: Have you seen someone named Mark Hertz?
exchange.answer: Colonel Hertz?! He's the one who keeps pummeling me in order to gouge new players into paying for upgrades. He's evil.

exchange.question: Why don't we team up and go after him?
exchange.answer: Why not? I couldn't be any more miserable as it is. Use the Mega Customizing Console to get started.

character.statement: What have I become? Microtransactions... cheevos... I'm a monster!
I couldn't take another half-baked bonus quest. But you've shown me the error of my ways. These bonus quests are well worth the price of membership. It's a bargain, really.
Let's go. I think Bucket Bot has things under control here.
Why'd you do it, Hertz? Why did you turn your back on Poptropica?
They could use that attitude back at Pop HQ.
